Method Summary

  • ~ (void) closest(el, tagname) Find the clostest element of type

Method Details

~ (void) closest(el, tagname)

Find the clostest element of type

Examples:

closest(myElement, 'div')

Parameters:

  • el ( Element ) — The element to start search from
  • tagname ( String ) — Name of tag to search for
